lead_paragraph: The luxury sports car maker Ferrari made a flat debut in Milan on Monday as it completed its divorce from Fiat Chrysler Automobiles.

headline.print_headline: A Tepid Debut for Ferrari at the Stock Listing in Milan
headline.main: A Tepid Debut for Ferrari at the Stock Listing in Milan

snippet: The luxury sports car maker Ferrari made a flat debut in Milan on Monday as it completed its divorce from Fiat Chrysler Automobiles.
abstract: Luxury sports car maker Ferrari has tepid debut on Milan stock market as it separates from Fiat Chrysler Automobiles.
